name: NextIT
overview:
Next IT Corporation provides intelligent customer experience solutions in the United States. It offers ActiveAgent, a Human Emulation Software that leverages an organization’s asset and resource portfolio through multiple service channels, such as the Web self-service, contact centers, intranet, and mobile devices. The company also provides technical, training, implementation, support, and maintenance services. Its software allows users to interact with technology, answer questions, and clarify users’ intents by asking follow-up questions, as well as supports branding, customer relations, and sales support strategies.

The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Spokane, Washington.
